ARABIC: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except from their wives and any slaves they own, in which case they incur no blame,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: except in regard to their spouses and those whom their right hands possess, for in regard to them they are not reproachable,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except from their wives and slave girls, in which case they are not to be blamed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except with their wives and the bondwomen in their possession, for there is no reproach on them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except from their wives or their right hand possessions -- for (then) they are not blameworthy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except in the case of their wives or those whom their right hands possess-- for these surely are not to be blamed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: save from their wives and what their right hands own, then not being blameworthy
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Save with their wives and those whom their right hands possess, for thus they are not blameworthy;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: except from their spouses and those whom they rightfully possess [through wedlock], for which they incur no blame --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Save in regard to their spouses or those whom their right hands own; so verily they are not blameworthy -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: (apart from their spouses and their slave women, for then they are not blameworthy;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Except with their wives and the (captives) whom their right hands possess,- for (then) they are not to be blamed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except with their wives and the (women slaves and captives) whom their right hands possess, for (then) they are not to be blamed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except from their wives and what their right hands own, for these they are not blameworthy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except from their spouses or those living under their control, for then they are free of blame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they are not to be blamed -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [70:30] except from their wives and those whom their right hands own, in the way of slavegirls, for in that case they are not blameworthy;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Save with their) four (wives and those whom their right hands possess) of slaves without limitation, (for thus they are not blameworthy) nor sinful; they are not reproached for indulging in that which is lawful;
